title: Willis Harlem Seen and Photo of Sport - purpose

content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the purpose of photographs like Source 2?

choices.label: To embrace the beauty in everyday Black life
To reinforce the notion of separatism
To advocate for legislation to create lasting change
To highlight suffering faced during the nadir

content.answer: To embrace the beauty in everyday Black life
